title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item.

Observed Behavior (OB):
OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item does not get highlighted or selected.
EB: Expected Behavior (EB): The item should be successfully selected and highlighted in the library outline view on the first attempt.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item.
3. Note that the item is not getting selected.
4. Select the same item again.
5. Observe that the item gets selected as expected.
